reg_pit.title: Direction No. 1 to the British Columbia Energy Regulator

change.changenote: Regulation title BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 187/2023, effective September 1, 2023.
change.bcl:text: Direction No. 1 to the Oil and Gas Commission

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "Act" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 187/2023, effective September 1, 2023.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Act means the Oil and Gas Activities Act;

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 187/2023, effective September 1, 2023.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This direction is issued to the regulator under sections 25 (1.1) and 95 (2) of the Act.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 187/2023, effective September 1, 2023.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Permit for conversion may not be issued
bcl:section.bcl:text: The regulator may not issue a permit to a person to convert an LNG facility pipeline into a pipeline for transporting oil or diluted bitumen.
